Sertapedic Brookstone Gel Mattress

  • Last Updated: November 29th, 2023

Upgrade Your Sleep !

Choose your dream mattress stress-free.

Enjoy the sleep you deserve

The Sertapedic Brookstone Gel Mattress

Offers a balance between comfort and support, featuring a dual foam layer construction with a top layer of gel-infused memory foam for pressure relief and cooling, and a bottom layer of firmer foam core for stability and support. At 8 inches tall, this mattress is available in various sizes, making it a budget-friendly option for those who sleep hot. Ideal for back and stomach sleepers, the mattress may not be suitable for side sleepers due to its firmness. It is designed to provide spinal alignment and pain relief, thanks to its gel memory foam layer and foam core, and offers good motion isolation, making it ideal for couples or those sensitive to motion disturbances during sleep. Customers can take advantage of the 120-day trial period to test the mattress at home and return it for a full refund if unsatisfied. The warranty for this mattress varies by model and covers defects in materials and workmanship. While the Sertapedic Brookstone Gel Mattress is a popular option, thorough research is advised for the best mattress option.
